summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json and does not add the required branding image files or update the frontend UI to render them. REQ-7 is not implemented based on the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add the Bhatoa Traders branding image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames and dimensions specified, and ensure they render in the existing UI locations (header/footer logo and hero banner).
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and no frontend code changes are shown to reference/render the new images. The only modified file is project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json) unrelated to adding branding images.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add branding image assets and render them; modifying project_state.json is not requested and does not contribute to REQ-7 acceptance criteria based on the diff summary.
